trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeCollapsed" />, <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeDataBound" />, <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded" />, or <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que manipulará o evento <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeCollapsed" />, <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeDataBound" />, <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded" /> ou <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate" /> do controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" />.

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeEventHandler> delegado, você identificar o método que manipulará o evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o manipulador de eventos, adicione uma instância do representante ao evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre, a menos que você remova o representante.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre delegados de manipulador de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeEventHandler> delegate to register an event-handling method programmatically.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeEventHandler> delegado para registrar um método de manipulação de eventos programaticamente.
